content: ककुभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Distinguished, superior. --भः {@--1@} A crooked piece of wood at the end of the lute. {@--2@} The tree Arjuna; ककुभसुरभिः शैलः <ls>U. 1. 33.</ls> {@--3@} A kind of goblin or evil spirit. {@--4@} One of the Rāgas or personified musical modes. --भा {@--1@} Space; quarter. {@--2@} One of the Rāgiṇīs. --भं A flower of the Kuṭaja tree; <ls>Me. 22.</ls>
